about_the_game:
Heroes For Hire is a business management game focused around building a dungeon raiding guild from the bottom up.

Managing a guild isn't going to be as easy as it sounds, though. When running any business, you already have to worry about your employees, your customers, your finances and your living quarters. Just imagine what can go wrong when you start bringing dungeons, fantasy and magic into the picture, too!

Think you have what it takes to run the number one guild in the county? If so, you can compete in tournaments and competitions with rival guilds to determine who really is Raiders Digest's top guild of the week!




Employees are the life blood of any business. After all, how are you going to raid dungeons when you don't have any dungeon raiders on the payroll?



  • Recruit and manage a team of heroes with their set of skills, personality and stats to help them during raids and tournaments.
  • Craft, buy and find equipment and weaponry that can tie-in roles and niches for the team and guild.
  • Make sure to keep the needs of your employees well met by adjusting their wages, schedule and living quarters.




Set up your heroes with the best equipment and items you can find, and go and let them explore some dungeons on their own when they're ready!



  • Make and upgrade your heroes' equipment using materials scavenged in raids and on gathering missions.
  • Craft the necessary tools needed to help your heroes out on their adventures, such as potions and bombs.
  • Build the furniture needed to turn your guild from a shack to a castle fit for a hero of any calibre.




Of course, there's more to running a guild than just the heroes and finances—there's the guild itself, too!



  • Expand your guild's living quarters with furniture that has been bought, found and crafted.
  • Raise your guild's reputation to attract more guest merchants and services with stringent housing requirements.
  • Build more rooms to improve the quality of life for your heroes, and unlock some upgrades at the same time.


Remember, there's always room to grow and expand your guild! So...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 7.1
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A resolution of 1280 x 720 or above is required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 7.1
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A resolution of 1920 x 1080 or above is recommended but not forced.

short_description: You've joined a guild before, right? So, where's the trouble in managing a guild of your own, too? Guide your heroes, raid some dungeons, and grow your guild to rise from the bottom of the ranks right up to the top in Heroes for Hire!
